alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:09PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Callahan, southeastern Jones and northeastern Taylor Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 509 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Potosi, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Baird, Wylie, Tye, Tuscola, Hawley, Buffalo Gap, Eula, Dudley, Potosi, View, Hamby, Caps, Dyess Afb, Impact, Camp Tonkawa and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 275 and 309. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Texas.
